Klasse ClientLobbyController

java.lang.Object
viewmodel.ClientLobbyController
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ClientLobbyController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller for the Lobby view. Manages the chat functionalities, user interface interactions, and communication with the server via the client.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL location, ResourceBundle resources)
      Initializes the Lobby controller. Sets up the client connection, UI event listeners, and displays a popup for user details.
      Angegeben von:
      initialize in Schnittstelle javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameter:
      location - The location used to resolve relative paths for the root object.
      resources - The resources used to localize the root object.

    • processPopupData

      public void processPopupData(String name)
      Processes data from the popup window and sends it to the server.
      Parameter:
      name - The username entered by the user.

    • showReconnectPrompt

      public void showReconnectPrompt()
      Displays a prompt when the connection to the server is lost. Allows the user to reconnect or exit the application.

    • getChatViewController

      public ChatViewController getChatViewController()

    • updateRobotButtons

      public void updateRobotButtons()
      Updates the robot selection buttons based on the current robot availability.

    • updateNamesAndRobot

      public void updateNamesAndRobot(int clientID, String playerName, int robot)
      Updates the player information in the grid based on their status.
      Parameter:
      clientID - The ID of the client.
      playerName - The name of the player.
      robot - The robot selected by the player, or "Not Selected" if none.

    • updateReadyStatus

      public void updateReadyStatus(int clientID, boolean isReady)

      public void updateGameBoardLabel(String selectedGameBoard)
      Updates the game board label with the selected game board.
      Parameter:
      selectedGameBoard - The name of the selected game board.
